title: Biden's foreign policy adviser: Trump has 'weaponized' the State Department
text: Tony Blinken, foreign policy adviser to Joe Biden and former deputy secretary of state, and Kathy Ruemmler, former White House counsel to President Barack Obama, join Michael Isikoff and Daniel Klaidman on “Skullduggery.” With multiple subpoenas for the impeachment inquiry in full flight, the group discusses in detail the process the whistleblower took that got us where we are today. They also dive deeper into the July 25 phone call between President Trump and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, now that we know Secretary of State Mike Pompeo was listening in. Blinken gives us an inside look into Biden and his son Hunter, while Ruemmler explains what the Dems should keep their focus on if they want to see this impeachment through. No shortage of topics on this episode.
